name: Student Result Management System /editmyexp.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Student Result Management System Student Result Management System 1.3"]
description: Student Result Management System是一个学生成绩管理系统。Student Result Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞与/editmyexp.php文件emp1ctc参数有关，由于应用程序未对输入参数进行严格的验证和清理。攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息或篡改数据库内容。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://phpgurukul.com/dairy-farm-shop-management-system-using-php-and-mysql/
patch: Student Result Management System /editmyexp.php文件SQL注入漏洞的补丁
